oldVersionNotice.displayName: New node version available: get the latest version with added features from the nodes panel.
oldVersionNotice.name: oldVersionNotice

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。 与鉴权相关，注意不要在公共日志中输出敏感信息。

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

projectId.name: projectId
projectId.description: ID of the project to retrieve all rows from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
projectId.ai_hint: ID of the project to retrieve all rows from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

datasetId.name: datasetId
datasetId.description: ID of the dataset to retrieve all rows from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
datasetId.ai_hint: ID of the dataset to retrieve all rows from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

tableId.name: tableId
tableId.description: ID of the table to retrieve all rows from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
tableId.ai_hint: ID of the table to retrieve all rows from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

columns.name: columns
columns.description: Comma-separated list of the item properties to use as columns
columns.ai_hint: Comma-separated list of the item properties to use as columns

options.name: options
selectedFields
options.description: Subset of fields to return, supports select into sub fields. Example: selectedFields = "a,e.d.f"

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data

conditional_rules: IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'record' THEN SHOW parameter 'projectId'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'record' THEN SHOW parameter 'datasetId'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'record' THEN SHOW parameter 'tableId'
IF resource == 'record' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'columns'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'record' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'record' THEN SHOW parameter 'projectId'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'record' THEN SHOW parameter 'datasetId'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'record' THEN SHOW parameter 'tableId'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'record' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'record' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'record' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'simple'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'record' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
